law.text: Unless otherwise provided, when construing or enforcing any provision of this subtitle, every act, omission, or failure of any person acting for or employed by another person shall be deemed the act, omission, or failure of the individual, partnership, corporation, association, or other business unit as well as of the person committing the act.
